author: mteroerd
body:
#### PR description:

- This PR is mainly supposed to ensure python 3 compatibility for the APE measuring tool. 
- More sanity checks were added to test/autoSubmitter/autoSubmitter.py and test/autoSubmitter/helpers.py. The additions ensure that files defined for a dataset do in fact exist and that files merged from multiple root files are not damaged.
- Automatic result plots were removed from test/autoSubmitter/autoSubmitter.py as this feature was not used and makes maintaning the code more complicated. Result plots can still be created using the code in test/plottingTools.
- Minor errors were fixed.

#### PR validation:

python3 compatibility was mainly enabled based on output of 2to3. Additionally, the code was dry-run in a CMSSW environment that was compiled with python3.
title: Changes to ape tool for python 3 compatibility and reduced bloat
